Articles.Content:
Hi guys!

Well, I finally registered here as well, after playing KSP for about half a year now. I love the game a lot

Besides KSP, I'm just a standard gamer I guess, I'm also a student at university and 23 years old... my hobbies besides gaming include climbing, inline hockey, hanging out with friends, photography, graphic design...

I also plan on doing commented KSP videos, but only have one video up so far (with another one going online tonight).

So, that's about it, nice to be here

Cheers!
Hi there paradogz and welcome to the forums! Make sure you promote your video channel in the Live From Mission Control! forum

Hi there paradogz and welcome to the forums! Make sure you promote your video channel in the Live From Mission Control! forum

Thanks for the hint, I'll be sure to do that
Well, I'd normally post some tips here, but 6 months? It was less than a week of playing before I joined. Anyhow, welcome to the forums! Feel free to PM me if you need any in-game help.
